original_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle. Highlight its sustainable features and unique selling points.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Add specific details about the features to clarify expectations.

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: Consider a clearer structure for the description.
Provide examples of similar product descriptions for reference.
Suggest a formatting style for the description.
Specify the desired length of the description.

enhanced_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle aimed at environmentally conscious consumers. Highlight its sustainable features (e.g., made from recycled materials, biodegradable components) and unique selling points (e.g., sleek design, durability). The description should be persuasive, no longer than 150 words, and formatted with bullet points for key features.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Clarity has been improved with more specific details.

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: The flow has been reorganized for better logical progression.
More relevant examples have been added to illustrate the points.
Markdown formatting has been improved for better readability.
The expected output format has been clarified.

enhanced_prompt.highlighted_prompt: The enhanced prompt has innovative content that was not present in the original prompt, such as aimed at environmentally conscious consumers, made from recycled materials, biodegradable components, persuasive, no longer than 150 words, and formatted with bullet points for key features. Additionally, several parts of the original prompt have been polished for better accuracy and refinement, including highlight its sustainable features and unique selling points. Overall, the enhanced prompt provides a clearer and more structured approach to the task.
